Documentation.long_help: Performs Kriging with a pointset and assays.
Documentation.short_help: Performs Kriging with a pointset and assays.

StringVectorProperty.name: SelectInputScalars
StringVectorProperty.label: Scalars
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property contains the name of the scalar array from which to perform an operation on.

IntVectorProperty.name: MinNeigh
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the minimum number of neighbours that must be found in the search ellipsoid to calculate a grade estimate and variance at each location in the pointset.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaxNeigh
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the maximum number of neighbours that can be used in the search ellipsoid to calculate a grade estimate and variance at each location in the pointset.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Ranges
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the magnitudes of the Kriging search ellipsoid. Primary, Secondary, then Tertiary.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Angles
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the angles of the Kriging search ellipsoid. Azimuth, Dip, then Rake.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Nugget
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the nugget effect of the variogram. If Nugget is 0, then you must define at least one variagram structure!

IntVectorProperty.name: StructCount
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of variogram structures (up to 3) you wish to use. If Nugget is 0, then you must define at least one variagram structure!

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Contribution
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the contribution value for each structure (1-10)

DoubleVectorProperty.name: R1
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the Primary Magnitude for each structure (1-10)

DoubleVectorProperty.name: R2
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the Secondary Magnitude for each structure (1-10)

DoubleVectorProperty.name: R3
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the Tertiary Magnitude for each structure (1-10)

DoubleVectorProperty.name: A1
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the Azimuth for each structure (1-10)

DoubleVectorProperty.name: A2
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the Dip for each structure (1-10)

DoubleVectorProperty.name: A3
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the Rake for each structure (1-10)

IntVectorProperty.name: StructType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the Structure Type for each structure (1-10).
